'''Calla Lily Seafood Soup''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Calla Lily Seafood Soup is obtainable from [[Sara]] in [[Good Hunter]] for 5,000 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 30.

Depending on the quality, Calla Lily Seafood Soup increases the party's defense by '''165'''/'''200'''/'''235''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]]; this effect only applies to the player's party.

{{Special Dish|Tartaglia|A Prize Catch}}
